front.title: Mapping YANG to Document Schema Definition Languages and Validating NETCONF Content

abstract.t: This document specifies the mapping rules for translating YANG data models into Document Schema Definition Languages (DSDL), a coordinated set of XML schema languages standardized as ISO/IEC 19757. The following DSDL schema languages are addressed by the mapping: RELAX NG, Schematron and DSRL. The mapping takes one or more YANG modules and produces a set of DSDL schemas for a selected target document type - datastore content, NETCONF message etc. Procedures for schema-based validation of such documents are also discussed.
